name: MMMmmm... Cake!
description: Littile Cake need to escape from this world. Use your mouse to jump across the obstacles. Can you help him, please?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (x64) Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
